Vegna breytinga er til sölu á aðseins 7500kr:
AUDIO PRO SUB EVICDENCE MKII
Type: Powered subwoofer with bult-in ace-bass®
ampliﬁ er, bass reﬂ ex
Ampliﬁ er: 150 W rms
Woofer: 8" long-throw
Frequency adjustment: 27-100 Hz
Lo-pass ﬁ lter: 50-100 Hz, variable 24 dB/octave
Hi-pass ﬁ lter: 100 Hz, 6 dB/octave
Dimensions (WxHxD): 320x352x370 mm
Weight: 13 kg
Connectors: Line and speaker level input, clip terminal
and RCA-input
Adjustments: Auto standby, variable level adjustment,
variable frequency adjustment 50-100 Hz
Cabinet: MDF
Finish: Vinyl foil
Colors: Cherry
